original_title: Spectrify AI conferred prestgious Innovator title at Innovate Lanka 2023
original_body_lines: Spectrify AI (Pvt) Ltd was awarded the prestigious ‘Innovator’ title at Innovate Lanka held recently. Spectrify AI was the winner for 2023 for its innovative suite of AI solutions specifically designed to radically optimize production, agri-inputs, and quality control across the entire value chain. Initially, the Company’s primary focus was on Sri Lankan tea but now they have ventured into other global agriculture produce such as Coffee, Wine etc.

“We are thrilled and honoured to receive this outstanding award. This recognition is a testament to the hard work, innovation, and dedication of our multi-talented diverse team”, commented Jihan Perera, Head of Sales & Partnerships at Spectrify AI (Pvt) Ltd.  This success underscores Spectrify AI’s pivotal role in advancing Sri Lanka’s agricultural industry, contributing to the nation’s prominence in the global arena.

Innovate Lanka is an annual event held as part of the Global Entrepreneurship Week (GEW). The core objective of Innovate Lanka is to stimulate innovation, entrepreneurship, and investment within Sri Lanka’s burgeoning startup ecosystem.  It is an initiative of the Lanka Angel Network (LAN), in partnership with ICTA, the Council for Startups, SLASSCOM and Hatch, that brings all start-up and SME ecosystem partners together, providing them an opportunity and a unique platform to present their ideas to potential investors.

At the 2023 Innovate Lanka, 10 exceptional startups pitched their groundbreaking concepts to a distinguished panel consisting of representatives from the Lanka Angel Network, the Council for Startups and SLASSCOM. Spectrify AI is proud to have been selection as the winner for 2023 and will represent Sri Lanka at the international Entrepreneurship World Cup (EWC) in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, in 2024 together with top global startups.
